#4# Paṇṇāsako
#5# mettāvaggo ^a^PA.IV,150^ea^ paṭhamo
#6# [91] 1 Evamme sutaṁ. Ekaṁ samayaṁ bhagavā sāvatthiyaṁ viharati
#7# jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme. Tatra kho bhagavā bhikkhū
#8# āmantesi bhikkhavoti. Bhadanteti te bhikkhū bhagavato paccassosuṁ.
#9# Bhagavā etadavoca mettāya bhikkhave cetovimuttiyā āsevitāya
#10# bhāvitāya bahulīkatāya yānīkatāya vatthukatāya anuṭṭhitāya paricitāya
#11# susamāraddhāya aṭṭhānisaṁsā pāṭikaṅkhā katame aṭṭha sukhaṁ supati sukhaṁ
#12# paṭibujjhati na pāpakaṁ supinaṁ passati manussānaṁ piyo hoti
#13# amanussānaṁ piyo hoti devatā rakkhanti nāssa aggi vā visaṁ vā
#14# satthaṁ vā kamati uttariṁ appaṭivijjhanto brahmalokūpago hoti. Mettāya
#15# bhikkhave cetovimuttiyā āsevitāya bhāvitāya bahulīkatāya yānīkatāya
#16# vatthukatāya anuṭṭhitāya paricitāya susamāraddhāya ime aṭṭhānisaṁsā
#17# pāṭikaṅkhāti.
#0# Yo ca mettaṁ bhāvayati appamāṇaṁ paṭissato
#1# tanū saṁyojanā honti passato upadhikkhayaṁ
#2# ekampi ce pāṇamaduṭṭhacitto
#3# mettāyati kusalaṁ { 1 Ma. kasali.} tena hoti
#4# sabbeva pāṇe manasānukampi
#5# pahūtamariyo ca { 2 Ma. pakaroti.} karoti puññaṁ
#6# ye sattasaṇḍaṁ paṭhaviṁ jinitvā
#7# rājissayo yajamānānucariyagā
#8# sassamedhaṁ purisamedhaṁ
#9# sammāpāsaṁ vājapeyyaṁ niraggaḷaṁ
#10# mettassa cittassa subhāvitassa
#11# kalampi te nānubhavanti soḷasiṁ
#12# candappabhā tāragaṇāva sabbe
#14# yo na hanati na ghāteti na jināti na jāpaye
#15# mettaso sabbabhūtānaṁ verantassa na kenacīti.
#16# [92] 2 Aṭṭhime bhikkhave hetu aṭṭha paccayā ādibrahmacariyikāya
#17# paññāya appaṭiladdhāya paṭilābhāya paṭiladdhāya bhiyyobhāvāya vepullāya
#18# bhāvanāya pāripūriyā saṁvattanti. Katame aṭṭha idha bhikkhave bhikkhu
#19# satthāraṁ upanissāya viharati aññataraṁ vā garuṭṭhāniyaṁ sabrahmacāriṁ
#20# yatthassa tibbaṁ hirottappaṁ paccupaṭṭhitaṁ hoti pemañca gāravo ca
#0# Ayaṁ bhikkhave paṭhamo hetu paṭhamo paccayo ādibrahmacariyikāya
#1# paññāya appaṭiladdhāya paṭilābhāya ^a^PA.IV,152^ea^ paṭiladdhāya bhiyyobhāvāya vepullāya
#2# bhāvanāya pāripūriyā saṁvattati. So taṁ satthāraṁ upanissāya viharati
#3# aññataraṁ vā garuṭṭhāniyaṁ sabrahmacāriṁ yatthassa tibbaṁ hirottappaṁ
#4# paccupaṭṭhitaṁ hoti pemañca gāravo ca so { 1 Ma. te.} kālena kālaṁ upasaṅkamitvā
#5# paripucchati paripañhati idaṁ bhante kathaṁ imassa ko atthoti
#6# tassa te āyasmanto avivaṭañceva vivaṭanti { 2 Ma. vivaranti. evamuparipi.} anuttānīkatañca uttānīkaronti
#7# anekavihitesu ca kaṅkhaṭṭhāniyesu dhammesu kaṅkhaṁ paṭivinodenti
#8# ayaṁ bhikkhave dutiyo hetu dutiyo paccayo ādibrahmacariyikāya paññāya
#9# appaṭiladdhāya paṭilābhāya paṭiladdhāya bhiyyobhāvāya vepullāya bhāvanāya
#10# pāripūriyā saṁvattati. So taṁ dhammaṁ sutvā dvayena vūpakāsena sampādeti
#11# kāyavūpakāsena ca cittavūpakāsena ca ayaṁ bhikkhave tatiyo hetu
#12# tatiyo paccayo ādibrahmacariyikāya paññāya appaṭiladdhāya paṭilābhāya
#13# paṭiladdhāya bhiyyobhāvāya vepullāya bhāvanāya pāripūriyā saṁvattati.
#14# Sīlavā hoti pātimokkhasaṁvarasaṁvuto viharati ācāragocarasampanno
#15# aṇumattesu vajjesu bhayadassāvī samādāya sikkhati sikkhāpadesu ayaṁ
#16# bhikkhave catuttho hetu catuttho paccayo ādibrahmacariyikāya paññāya
#17# appaṭiladdhāya paṭilābhāya paṭiladdhāya bhiyyobhāvāya vepullāya bhāvanāya
#18# pāripūriyā saṁvattati. Bahussuto hoti sutadharo sutasannicayo ye te
#19# dhammā ādikalyāṇā majjhekalyāṇā pariyosānakalyāṇā sātthaṁ
#0# Sabyañjanaṁ kevalaparipuṇṇaṁ parisuddhaṁ brahmacariyaṁ abhivadanti tathārūpāssa
#1# dhammā bahussutā honti dhatā vacasā paricitā manasānupekkhitā
#2# diṭṭhiyā suppaṭividdhā ayaṁ bhikkhave pañcamo hetu pañcamo
#3# paccayo ādibrahmacariyikāya paññāya appaṭiladdhāya paṭilābhāya
#4# paṭiladdhāya bhiyyobhāvāya vepullāya bhāvanāya pāripūriyā saṁvattati.
#5# Āraddhaviriyo viharati akusalānaṁ dhammānaṁ pahānāya kusalānaṁ dhammānaṁ
#6# upasampadāya thāmavā daḷhaparakkamo anikkhittadhuro kusalesu dhammesu
#7# ayaṁ bhikkhave chaṭṭho hetu chaṭṭho paccayo ādibrahmacariyikāya paññāya
#8# appaṭiladdhāya paṭilābhāya paṭiladdhāya bhiyyobhāvāya vepullāya bhāvanāya
#9# pāripūriyā saṁvattati. Saṅghagato kho pana anānākathiko hoti atiracchānakathiko
#10# sāmaṁ vā dhammaṁ bhāsati paraṁ vā ajjhesati ariyaṁ vā
#11# tuṇhībhāvaṁ nātimaññati ayaṁ bhikkhave sattamo hetu sattamo
#12# paccayo ādibrahmacariyikāya paññāya appaṭiladdhāya paṭilābhāya paṭiladdhāya
#13# bhiyyobhāvāya vepullāya bhāvanāya pāripūriyā saṁvattati. Pañcasu
#14# kho pana upādānakkhandhesu udayabbayānupassī viharati iti rūpaṁ iti
#15# rūpassa samudayo iti rūpassa atthaṅgamo iti vedanā ... Iti saññā ...
#16# Iti saṅkhārā ... Iti viññāṇaṁ iti viññāṇassa samudayo iti
#17# viññāṇassa atthaṅgamoti ayaṁ bhikkhave aṭṭhamo hetu aṭṭhamo paccayo
#18# ādibrahmacariyikāya paññāya appaṭiladdhāya paṭilābhāya paṭiladdhāya
#19# bhiyyobhāvāya vepullāya bhāvanāya pāripūriyā saṁvattati.
#0# Tamenaṁ sabrahmacārī evaṁ sambhāventi { 1 Ma. ayaṁ kho.} āyasmā satthāraṁ
#1# upanissāya viharati aññataraṁ vā garuṭṭhāniyaṁ sabrahmacāriṁ yatthassa tibbaṁ
#2# hirottappaṁ paccupaṭṭhitaṁ hoti pemañca gāravo ca addhā ayamāyasmā
#3# jānaṁ jānāti passaṁ passatīti ayaṁpi dhammo piyatāya garutāya
#4# bhāvanāya sāmaññāya ekībhāvāya saṁvattati. Taṁ kho panāyamāyasmā
#5# satthāraṁ upanissāya viharati aññataraṁ vā ^a^PA.IV,154^ea^ garuṭṭhāniyaṁ sabrahmacāriṁ
#6# yatthassa tibbaṁ hirottappaṁ paccupaṭṭhitaṁ hoti pemañca gāravo ca
#7# so { 2 Ma. te.} kālena kālaṁ upasaṅkamitvā paripucchati paripañhati idaṁ bhante
#8# kathaṁ imassa ko atthoti tassa te āyasmanto avivaṭañceva vivaṭanti
#9# anuttānīkatañca uttānīkaronti anekavihitesu ca kaṅkhaṭṭhāniyesu
#10# dhammesu kaṅkhaṁ paṭivinodenti addhā ayamāyasmā jānaṁ jānāti passaṁ
#11# passatīti ayaṁpi dhammo piyatāya garutāya bhāvanāya sāmaññāya
#12# ekībhāvāya saṁvattati. Taṁ kho panāyamāyasmā dhammaṁ sutvā dvayena
#13# vūpakāsena sampādeti kāyavūpakāsena ca cittavūpakāsena ca addhā
#14# ayamāyasmā jānaṁ jānāti passaṁ passatīti ayaṁpi dhammo piyatāya
#15# garutāya bhāvanāya sāmaññāya ekībhāvāya saṁvattati. Sīlavā kho
#16# panāyamāyasmā pātimokkhasaṁvarasaṁvuto viharati ācāragocarasampanno
#17# aṇumattesu vajjesu bhayadassāvī samādāya sikkhati sikkhāpadesu addhā

#19# garutāya bhāvanāya sāmaññāya ekībhāvāya saṁvattati. Bahussuto kho
#0# Panāyamāyasmā sutadharo sutasannicayo ye te dhammā ādikalyāṇā
#1# majjhekalyāṇā pariyosānakalyāṇā sātthaṁ sabyañjanaṁ kevalaparipuṇṇaṁ
#2# parisuddhaṁ brahmacariyaṁ abhivadanti tathārūpāssa dhammā bahussutā honti
#3# dhatā vacasā paricitā manasānupekkhitā diṭṭhiyā suppaṭividdhā addhā
#4# ayamāyasmā jānaṁ jānāti passaṁ passatīti ayaṁpi dhammo piyatāya
#5# garutāya bhāvanāya sāmaññāya ekībhāvāya saṁvattati. Āraddhaviriyo
#6# kho panāyamāyasmā viharati akusalānaṁ dhammānaṁ pahānāya kusalānaṁ
#7# dhammānaṁ upasampadāya thāmavā daḷhaparakkamo anikkhittadhuro kusalesu
#8# dhammesu addhā ayamāyasmā jānaṁ jānāti passaṁ passatīti ayaṁpi
#9# dhammo piyatāya garutāya bhāvanāya sāmaññāya ekībhāvāya saṁvattati.
#10# Saṅghagato kho panāyamāyasmā anānākathiko hoti atiracchānakathiko sāmaṁ
#11# vā dhammaṁ bhāsati paraṁ vā ajjhesati ariyaṁ vā tuṇhībhāvaṁ
#12# nātimaññati addhā ayamāyasmā jānaṁ jānāti passaṁ passatīti ayaṁpi
#13# dhammo piyatāya garutāya bhāvanāya sāmaññāya ekībhāvāya saṁvattati.
#14# Pañcasu kho panāyamāyasmā upādānakkhandhesu udayabbayānupassī viharati
#15# iti rūpaṁ iti rūpassa samudayo iti rūpassa atthaṅgamo iti vedanā ...
#16# Iti saññā ... Iti saṅkhārā ... Iti viññāṇaṁ iti viññāṇassa samudayo
#17# iti viññāṇassa atthaṅgamoti addhā ayamāyasmā jānaṁ jānāti
#18# passaṁ passatīti ayaṁpi dhammo piyatāya garutāya bhāvanāya sāmaññāya
#19# ekībhāvāya saṁvattati. Ime kho bhikkhave aṭṭha hetū aṭṭha
#0# Paccayā ādibrahmacariyikāya paññāya appaṭiladdhāya paṭilābhāya
#1# paṭiladdhāya bhiyyobhāvāya vepullāya bhāvanāya pāripūriyā saṁvattantīti.
#2# [93] 3 Aṭṭhahi bhikkhave dhammehi samannāgato bhikkhu sabrahmacārīnaṁ
#3# appiyo ca hoti amanāpo ca agaru ca abhāvanīyo ca. Katamehi
#4# aṭṭhahi idha bhikkhave bhikkhu appiyapasaṁsī ca hoti piyagarahī ca lābhakāmo
#5# ca sakkārakāmo ca ahiriyo { 1 Ma. ahiriko.} ca anottappī ca pāpiccho ca micchādiṭṭhi
#6# ca. Imehi kho bhikkhave aṭṭhahi dhammehi samannāgato bhikkhu
#7# sabrahmacārīnaṁ appiyo ca hoti amanāpo ca agaru ca abhāvanīyo ca.
#8# Aṭṭhahi bhikkhave dhammehi samannāgato bhikkhu sabrahmacārīnaṁ piyo
#9# ca hoti manāpo ca garu ca bhāvanīyo ca. Katamehi aṭṭhahi idha
#10# bhikkhave bhikkhu nāppiyapasaṁsī ca hoti napiyagarahī ca nalābhakāmo ca
#11# nasakkārakāmo ca hirimā ca { 2 Ma. hoti.} ottappī ca appiccho ca sammādiṭṭhi
#12# ca. Imehi kho bhikkhave aṭṭhahi dhammehi samannāgato bhikkhu sabrahmacārīnaṁ
#13# piyo ca hoti manāpo ca garu ca bhāvanīyo cāti.
#14# [94] 4 Aṭṭhahi bhikkhave dhammehi samannāgato bhikkhu sabrahmacārīnaṁ
#15# appiyo ca hoti amanāpo ca agaru ca abhāvanīyo ca. Katamehi aṭṭhahi
#16# idha bhikkhave bhikkhu lābhakāmo ca hoti sakkārakāmo ca anavaññattikāmo
#17# ca akālaññū ca amattaññū ca asuci ca bahubhāṇī ca
#18# akkosakaparibhāsako ca sabrahmacārīnaṁ. Imehi kho bhikkhave aṭṭhahi
#19# dhammehi samannāgato bhikkhu sabrahmacārīnaṁ appiyo ca hoti amanāpo
#0# Ca agaru ca abhāvanīyo ca. Aṭṭhahi bhikkhave dhammehi samannāgato
#1# bhikkhu sabrahmacārīnaṁ piyo ca hoti manāpo ca garu ca bhāvanīyo ca. Katamehi
#2# aṭṭhahi idha bhikkhave bhikkhu nalābhakāmo ca hoti nasakkārakāmo ca
#3# nānavaññattikāmo ca kālaññū ca mattaññū ca suci ca nabahubhāṇī
#4# ca anakkosakaparibhāsako ca sabrahmacārīnaṁ. Imehi kho bhikkhave
#5# aṭṭhahi dhammehi samannāgato bhikkhu sabrahmacārīnaṁ piyo ca hoti manāpo
#6# ca garu ca bhāvanīyo cāti.
#7# [95] 5 Aṭṭhime bhikkhave lokadhammā lokaṁ anuparivattanti loko
#8# ca aṭṭha lokadhamme anuparivattati. Katame aṭṭha lābho ca alābho
#9# ca yaso ca ayaso ca nindā ca pasaṁsā ca sukhaṁ ca dukkhaṁ ca. Ime
#10# kho bhikkhave aṭṭha lokadhammā lokaṁ anuparivattanti loko ca ime
#11# aṭṭha lokadhamme anuparivattatīti.
#12# Lābho alābho ca yasāyaso ca
#13# nindā pasaṁsā ca sukhaṁ dukkhañca
#14# ete aniccā manujesu dhammā
#15# asassatā vipariṇāmadhammā
#16# ete ca ñatvā satimā sumedho
#17# avekkhati vipariṇāmadhamme
#18# iṭṭhassa dhammā na mathenti cittaṁ
#19# aniṭṭhato no paṭighātameti
#0# Tassānurodhā atha vā virodhā
#1# vidhūpitā atthagatā { 1 Ma. atthaṅgatā. evamuparipi.} na santi
#2# padañca ñatvā virajaṁ asokaṁ
#3# sammappajānāti bhavassa pāragūti.
#4# [96] 6 Aṭṭhime bhikkhave lokadhammā lokaṁ anuparivattanti loko
#5# ca aṭṭha lokadhamme anuparivattati katame aṭṭha lābho ca
#6# alābho ca yaso ca ayaso ca nindā ca pasaṁsā ca sukhaṁ ca dukkhaṁ
#7# ca ime kho bhikkhave aṭṭha lokadhammā lokaṁ anuparivattanti loko
#8# ca ime aṭṭha lokadhamme anuparivattati assutavato bhikkhave puthujjanassa
#9# uppajjati lābhopi alābhopi yasopi ayasopi nindāpi pasaṁsāpi
#10# sukhaṁpi dukkhaṁpi sutavatopi bhikkhave ariyasāvakassa uppajjati lābhopi
#11# alābhopi yasopi ^a^PA.IV,158^ea^ ayasopi nindāpi pasaṁsāpi sukhaṁpi dukkhaṁpi tatra
#12# bhikkhave ko viseso ko adhippāyaso { 2 Sī. adhippāyo. Ma. adhippayāso. evamuparipi.} kiṁnānākaraṇaṁ sutavato
#13# ariyasāvakassa assutavatā puthujjanenāti. Bhagavaṁmūlakā no bhante
#14# dhammā bhagavaṁnettikā bhagavaṁpaṭisaraṇā sādhu vata bhante bhagavantaṁyeva
#15# paṭibhātu etassa bhāsitassa attho bhagavato sutvā bhikkhū
#16# dhāressantīti. Tenahi bhikkhave suṇātha sādhukaṁ manasikarotha bhāsissāmīti.
#17# Evaṁ bhanteti kho te bhikkhū bhagavato paccassosuṁ. Bhagavā etadavoca
#18# assutavato bhikkhave puthujjanassa uppajjati lābho so na iti
#19# paṭisañcikkhati uppanno kho me ayaṁ lābho so ca kho anicco dukkho
#0# Vipariṇāmadhammoti yathābhūtaṁ nappajānāti uppajjati alābho
#1# uppajjati yaso uppajjati ayaso uppajjati nindā uppajjati pasaṁsā
#2# uppajjati sukhaṁ uppajjati dukkhaṁ so na iti paṭisañcikkhati uppannaṁ
#3# kho me idaṁ dukkhaṁ tañca kho aniccaṁ dukkhaṁ vipariṇāmadhammanti
#4# yathābhūtaṁ nappajānāti tassa lābhopi cittaṁ pariyādāya tiṭṭhati
#5# alābhopi cittaṁ pariyādāya tiṭṭhati yasopi cittaṁ pariyādāya tiṭṭhati
#6# ayasopi cittaṁ pariyādāya tiṭṭhati nindāpi cittaṁ pariyādāya tiṭṭhati
#7# pasaṁsāpi cittaṁ pariyādāya tiṭṭhati sukhaṁpi cittaṁ pariyādāya tiṭṭhati
#8# dukkhaṁpi cittaṁ pariyādāya tiṭṭhati so uppannaṁ lābhaṁ anurujjhati
#9# alābhe paṭivirujjhati uppannaṁ yasaṁ anurujjhati ayase paṭivirujjhati
#10# uppannaṁ pasaṁsaṁ anurujjhati nindāya paṭivirujjhati uppannaṁ sukhaṁ
#11# anurujjhati dukkhe paṭivirujjhati so evaṁ anurodhavirodhasamāpanno na
#12# parimuccati jātiyā jarāya maraṇena sokehi paridevehi dukkhehi
#13# domanassehi upāyāsehi na parimuccati dukkhasmāti vadāmi.
#14# Sutavato ca kho bhikkhave ariyasāvakassa uppajjati lābho so iti
#15# paṭisañcikkhati uppanno kho me ayaṁ lābho so ca kho anicco
#16# dukkho vipariṇāmadhammoti ^a^PA.IV,159^ea^ yathābhūtaṁ pajānāti uppajjati alābho
#17# uppajjati yaso uppajjati ayaso uppajjati nindā uppajjati pasaṁsā
#18# uppajjati sukhaṁ uppajjati dukkhaṁ so iti paṭisañcikkhati uppannaṁ
#19# kho me idaṁ dukkhaṁ tañca kho aniccaṁ dukkhaṁ vipariṇāmadhammanti yathābhūtaṁ
#0# Idaṁ dukkhaṁ tañca kho aniccaṁ dukkhaṁ vipariṇāmadhammanti yathābhūtaṁ
#1# pajānāti tassa lābhopi cittaṁ na pariyādāya tiṭṭhati alābhopi cittaṁ
#2# na pariyādāya tiṭṭhati yasopi cittaṁ na pariyādāya tiṭṭhati ayasopi
#3# cittaṁ na pariyādāya tiṭṭhati nindāpi cittaṁ na pariyādāya tiṭṭhati
#4# pasaṁsāpi cittaṁ na pariyādāya tiṭṭhati sukhaṁpi cittaṁ na pariyādāya tiṭṭhati
#5# dukkhaṁpi cittaṁ na pariyādāya tiṭṭhati so ca uppannaṁ lābhaṁ nānurujjhati
#6# alābhe nappaṭivirujjhati uppannaṁ yasaṁ nānurujjhati ayase
#7# nappaṭivirujjhati uppannaṁ pasaṁsaṁ nānurujjhati nindāya nappaṭivirujjhati
#8# uppannaṁ sukhaṁ nānurujjhati dukkhe nappaṭivirujjhati so
#9# evaṁ anurodhavirodhavippahīno parimuccati jātiyā jarāya maraṇena sokehi
#10# paridevehi dukkhehi domanassehi upāyāsehi parimuccati dukkhasmāti
#11# vadāmi ayaṁ kho bhikkhave viseso ayaṁ adhippāyaso idaṁ
#12# nānākaraṇaṁ sutavato ariyasāvakassa assutavatā puthujjanenāti.
#13# Lābho alābho ca yasāyaso ca
#14# nindā pasaṁsā ca sukhaṁ dukkhañca

#1# passati subhanteva adhimutto hoti sabbaso rūpasaññānaṁ samatikkamā
#2# paṭighasaññānaṁ atthaṅgamā nānattasaññānaṁ amanasikārā ananto
#3# ākāsoti ākāsānañcāyatanaṁ upasampajja viharati sabbaso ākāsānañcāyatanaṁ
#4# samatikkamma anantaṁ viññāṇanti viññāṇañcāyatanaṁ
#5# upasampajja viharati sabbaso viññāṇañcāyatanaṁ samatikkamma natthi
#6# kiñcīti ākiñcaññāyatanaṁ upasampajja viharati sabbaso ākiñcaññāyatanaṁ
#7# samatikkamma nevasaññānā saññāyatanaṁ upasampajja viharati sabbaso
#8# nevasaññānāsaññāyatanaṁ samatikkamma saññāvedayitanirodhaṁ upasampajja
#9# viharati. Rāgassa bhikkhave abhiññāya ime aṭṭha dhammā bhāvetabbā.
#10# [204] 114 ^a^PA.IV,350^ea^ Rāgassa bhikkhave pariññāya parikkhayāya pahānāya khayāya
#11# vayāya virāgāya nirodhāya cāgāya paṭinissaggāya ime aṭṭha dhammā
#12# bhāvetabbāti. Dosassa mohassa kodhassa upanāhassa makkhassa palāsassa
#13# issāya macchariyassa māyāya sātheyyassa thambhassa sārambhassa mānassa
#14# atimānassa madassa pamādassa abhiññāya pariññāya parikkhayāya pahānāya
#15# khayāya vayāya virāgāya nirodhāya cāgāya paṭinissaggāya ime aṭṭha
#16# dhammā bhāvetabbāti.
